thread.title: Watch: This Season ‘SNL’ Gives the Gift of Heart-Shaped Black History Chocolate Boxes
thread.title_full: Watch: This Season ‘SNL’ Gives the Gift of Heart-Shaped Black History Chocolate Boxes

author: Brenna Houck
title: Watch: This Season ‘SNL’ Gives the Gift of Heart-Shaped Black History Chocolate Boxes
text: share With Valentine’s Day right around the corner, Saturday Night Live is back with another parody commercial for a special heart-shaped box of chocolates perfect for that other thing Americans celebrate in February — Black History Month. The Russell Stover spoof ad suggests giving the special someone in your life a a Black History Heart Shaped Box filled with the chocolate-shaped heads of “28 scrumptious African American heroes, one for each delicious day of this important month.” Because it isn’t insulting enough that all of Black history gets crammed into one month of the year, the recipients are clearly unimpressed with the not so clever peanut-centered George Washington Carver and the aberrant white chocolate Bill Clinton. Meanwhile, their caucasian partners get to feel like they’re supportive. Maybe just stick with the regular chocolate this year. Check out the full video above.
